root.name: Subarashiki Hibi: Furenzoku Sonzai
root.description: OverviewSubarashiki Hibi is a story told in six chapters and by six different protagonists. Each chapter tells the story of a certain event that takes place through the month of July 2012 from a variety of different perspectives.ChaptersEach story takes its name from a chapter in Alice in Wonderland or Through the Looking Glass.“Down the Rabbit-Hole” The Story of the Sky and the World.“It’s my own Invention” The Story of the Beginning or the End.“Looking-glass Insects” The Story of the Literature Girl and the Science Girl.“Jabberwocky” The Story of the Savior and the Hero.“Which Dreamed It” The Story of the Brother and the Sister.“JabberwockyII” The Story of Sunflowers and the Hill Road.
